# Copilot Instructions

This repository defines agent guidance in `.github/copilot-instructions.md`. If you are an automated coding agent, start there for architecture, workflows, and conventions specific to Advancia Pay Ledger.

Key entry points:
- Backend: `backend/src/index.ts`
- Frontend: `frontend/`
- Prisma schema: `backend/prisma/schema.prisma`

See also `.github/copilot-workspace.yaml` and `.github/copilot-agent.json` for agent runtime and commands.
